snippet: Microsoft’s $7.2 billion deal for Nokia’s phone units is an attempt to catapult the company up the ranks in the smartphone market, which has been dominated by more established players, like Apple and Google.
abstract: Microsoft’s $7.2 billion deal for Nokia’s phone units is an attempt to catapult the company up the ranks in the smartphone market, which has been dominated by more established players, like Apple and Google.

headline.main: With Microsoft-Nokia Deal, Competing in the Smartphone Market
